version_description:
• Added Audiobus remote triggers for Preset navigation and Sampler Rate control.
• Fixed rare crash during MIDI handling.
• Fixed MIDI setup dialog driver refresh.

* Support for iOS 9 and later.
* Support for iPhone 6s and later.
* Support for Bluetooth A2DP.
* Improvements to audio engine.
* Updated Audiobus and AudioCopy libraries.
* Filtatron now requires at least iOS 8.
* Integrated Audiobus 3 with support for MIDI routing

* Fixed import from media library on iOS 10
* Updated Audiobus SDK to version 3.0.2

• Added support for Ableton Link tempo sync.
• Added support for iPhone X.
• Updated Audiobus library to latest version.

• Added support for Ableton Link tempo sync.
• Added support for iPhone X.
• Updated Audiobus library to latest version.
